member.name: FILE_STREAM_INFO
member.summary: Receives file stream information for the specified file. Used for any handles. Use only when calling .

member.name: FILE_STREAM_INFO.NextEntryOffset
member.summary: The offset for the next FILE_STREAM_INFO entry that is returned. This member is zero if no other entries follow this one.

member.name: FILE_STREAM_INFO.StreamNameLength
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of StreamName.

member.name: FILE_STREAM_INFO.StreamSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the data stream.

member.name: FILE_STREAM_INFO.StreamAllocationSize
member.summary: The amount of space that is allocated for the stream, in bytes. This value is usually a multiple of the sector or cluster size of the underlying physical device.
